CustomField.formula: IF ( AND( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Authoring"), $Permission.CLM_Account_Manager_Permission, $User.Id = OwnerId, OR( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Ready for Review"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Other Party Review"))), HYPERLINK("/apex/ApprovalsValidationPage?id=" &Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_SubmitRequest", "Submit Request"), "_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: SubmitRequest_Custom
